title: Title
notice_content_1: Welcome to the Threaded Bulletin Board! Have you ever heard of Bamboo Forest? It is right there! The so-called Bamboo Forest!
usage_guide1: 1. First, sign up for membership! (*Email authentication required!)
usage_guide2: 2. You can start a conversation with a topic you think of by clicking the Create New Thread button.
usage_guide3: 3. I see a thread that I like? Click on that thread, leave a comment and join the story!
